Title: Don't Ever Change
Plot: House and his team must diagnose a Jewish bride who is taken ill at her wedding. However, House is more interested in analyzing Wilson's relationship with his new girlfriend.
GuestStars: Laura Silverman, Kirsty Pape, Eyal Podell, Heather Joy Sher, Faye DeWitt, Yossi Mintz, Yanky Lunger, Brent Katz
